mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mypage_guestbook (guestbook_id, member_id, content, mypage_owner) VALUE ({#guestbook_id}, #{member_id}, #{content}, #{mypage_owner})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mypage_guestbook WHERE mypage_owner = #{mypage_owner} ORDER BY guestbook_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mypage_guestbook_comment (guestbook_comment_id, member_id, guestbook_id, content) VALUE (#{guestbook_comment_id}, #{member_id}, #{guestbook_id}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mypage_guestbook_comment WHERE guestbook_id = #{guestbook_id} ORDER BY guestbook_comment_id
